about

Erika Verkaaik is an award-winning, Brisbane based game designer. They dabble in both digital and analogue games and like to make games about connection, exploration and discovery.

They are passionate about small, alternative games and the communities that make them. In their spare time, they organise and run a local game dev meetup called Squiggly River. They are also on the board for Making Space.

Erika has a Bachelor of Animation and a Grad Cert in Interaction Design. They have previously taught as a game design lecturer but are now studying their Masters full time.

You can best contact them through Twitter or via email: erikaverkaaik@gmail.com

Otherwise, you can find them online in various places:
